description: A notification is sent whenever the fault is detected. Setting the
cienaCesCfmFaultTrapState object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be
suppressed. Variable bindings include cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmServiceName
cienaCesCfmServiceType, cienaCesCfmServiceValue
cienaCesCfmServiceAdminState, cienaCesCfmServiceOperState
cienaCesCfmServiceMdLevel, cienaCesCfmServiceFaultTime
cienaCesCfmServiceFaultType, cienaCesCfmServiceFaultDesc
cienaCesCfmServiceFaultMep, and cienaCesCfmServiceVsPbtName.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFaultTrapSet CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceType i 1 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceValue i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceAdminState i 1 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceOperState i 1 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceMdLevel i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultTime t 31536000 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultType i 2 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultDesc s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultMep i 1 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceVsPbtName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This MIB object indicates the CFM service name.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName

description: This object is used to specify the service type.
The meaning of cienaCesCfmServiceValue depends on the value of this MIB object.
This MIB object along with cienaCesCfmServiceValue must be unique for each entry in this table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceType

description: This object is used to specify the service value.
The meaning of this object depends on the value of cienaCesCfmServiceType.
This MIB object along with cienaCesCfmServiceType must be unique for each entry in this table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceValue

description: This object indicates the administrative state of CFM for this service type.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceAdminState

description: This object indicates the operational state of CFM for this service type.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceOperState

description: This MIB object indicates the maintenance domain level associated with the CFM service.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceMdLevel

description: This object indicates the time at which the fault occurred.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultTime

description: This object indicates the type of fault.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultType

description: This object indicates the description of the fault.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultDesc

description: This object indicates the MEP ID of the MEP reporting the fault.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceFaultMep

description: This object indicates the virtual switch or PBB-TE tunnel
assigned to the given service.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceVsPbtName

description: A notification is sent whenever the fault is resolved and cleared. Setting the
cienaCesCfmFaultTrapState object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be
suppressed. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmServiceName
cienaCesCfmServiceType, cienaCesCfmServiceValue
cienaCesCfmServiceAdminState, cienaCesCfmServiceOperState
cienaCesCfmServiceMdLevel, cienaCesCfmServiceVsPbtName
cienaCesCfmServiceFaultTime, cienaCesCfmServiceFaultType
cienaCesCfmServiceFaultDesc, and cienaCesCfmServiceFaultMep.

event.Summary: Fault $v10 resolved and cleared on $v4 service $v3

description: A notification is sent whenever average delay goes above delay-threshold
during a delay measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmDelayFaultTrapState
object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings
include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesCfmDelayMsgServiceName, cienaCesCfmDelayMsgLocalMEPId
cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayThreshold, and cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelay.

event.Summary: Average delay ($v6) exceeded threshold on service $v3

cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName,cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgNearLossThreshold, and cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossNear.

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object indicates the service associated with
the frame loss measurement message (LMM).
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName

description: This object is used to specify the local MEP ID at the source.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId

description: Indicates the threshold value for the near-end frame loss.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgNearLossThreshold

description: This object indicates the near-end frame loss. For a MEP
near-end frame loss refers to frame loss associated with the
ingress data frames.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossNear

description: A notification is sent whenever frame-loss-near returns to normal during a
frame loss measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmFrameLossNearFaultTrapState
object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgNearLossThreshold, and
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossNear.

event.Summary: Frame-loss-near ($v5) is normal on service $v2

description: Indicates the threshold value for the near-end frame loss.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgNearLossThreshold

description: This object indicates the near-end frame loss. For a MEP
near-end frame loss refers to frame loss associated with the
ingress data frames.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossNear

description: A notification is sent whenever frame-loss-far goes above frame-loss-far threshold during a
frame loss measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmFrameLossFarFaultTrapState object to
'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFarLossThreshold, and cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossFar.

event.Summary: Frame-loss-far ($v6) exceeded threshold on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossFarTrapSet CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 4 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFarLossThreshold i 600 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossFar u 9999

variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossFar

description: A notification is sent whenever frame-loss-far returns to normal during a
frame loss measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmFrameLossFarFaultTrapState
object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings
include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgServiceName
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgLocalMEPId, cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFarLossThreshold, and
cienaCesCfmFrameLossMsgFrameLossFar.

description: A notification is sent whenever the fault is detected during
a Synthetic Loss Measurement test with a near loss threshold fault. Setting the
cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossNearFaultTrapState object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed.
Variable bindings include : cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionServiceName
cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear, cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionLossNearThreshold.

event.Summary: Synthetic near loss measurement exceeded threshold on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesSyntheticLossSessionNearFaultTrap CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionLossNearThreshold i 999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object specifies the service name of the SLM message.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionServiceName

description: This object specifies the Near Loss Threshold in the latest test iteration.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear

description: This object represents the Near Loss Threshold Fault for the Synthetic Loss Measurement test.
A value of -1 disables the generation of faults. A value of 0 or greater
is compared to the synthetic loss near result of the
test and a fault is generated if the threshold is exceeded.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionLossNearThreshold

description: A notification is sent whenever the fault is detected during
a Synthetic Loss Measurement test with a far loss threshold fault. Setting the
cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossFarFaultTrapState object to 'disabled' causes this trap to be suppressed.
Variable bindings include: cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionServiceName, cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar
cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionLossFarThreshold.

event.Summary: Synthetic far loss measurement exceeded threshold on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesSyntheticLossSessionFarFaultTrap CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionLossFarThreshold i 999

description: A notification is sent whenever Average Delay Variation goes above Average Delay Variation threshold during
a Delay Variation measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmDelayVariationFaultTrapState object to 'disabled'
causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmDelayMsgServiceName, cienaCesCfmDelayMsgLocalMEPId
cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariationThreshold, and cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariation.

event.Summary: Average delay variation ($v6) exceeded the threshold on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmAverageDelayVariationTrapSet CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 4 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmDelayMsgServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmDelayMsgLocalMEPId i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariationThreshold i 999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariation u 9999

A value of -1 disables the generation of faults. A value of 0 or greater
is compared to the Average Delay Variation measured in the test and a fault is generated
if the threshold is exceeded.

description: This object indicates the Average Inter Frame Delay Variation.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariation

description: A notification is sent whenever Average Delay Variation comes back below the threshold level during
a Delay Variation measurement test. Setting the cienaCesCfmDelayVariationFaultTrapState object to 'disabled'
causes this trap to be suppressed. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesCfmDelayMsgServiceName, cienaCesCfmDelayMsgLocalMEPId
cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariationThreshold, and cienaCesCfmDelayMsgAverageDelayVariation.

event.Summary: Average delay variation ($v6) is normal on service $v3

description: A notification is sent whenever the signal degrade fault is detected during
a Synthetic Loss Measurement test.

event.Summary: Synthetic loss measurement signal degrade fault detected on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSignalDegradeFaultTrapSet CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar i 9999 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdSetThreshold i 999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This MIB object indicates the CFM service name.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName

description: This object specifies the Near Loss Threshold in the latest test iteration.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear

description: This object specifies the Far Loss Threshold in the latest test iteration.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar

description: This object represents the signal degrade set threshold value for the synthetic loss measurement test.
A value of 0 or greater is compared to the frame loss result and fault is set, if the loss exceeds
this threshold. A value of -1 disables the generation of signal degrade fault notification.
This object works in conjunction with cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdClearThreshold. If one object is given
non-default value, other should be also set to non-default value.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdSetThreshold

description: A notification is sent whenever the signal degrade fault is cleared during
a Synthetic Loss Measurement test.

event.Summary: Synthetic loss session signal degrade fault cleared on service $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSignalDegradeFaultTrapClear CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 1 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear i 99 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar i 99 CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdClearThreshold i 999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This MIB object indicates the CFM service name.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmServiceName

description: This object specifies the Near Loss Threshold in the latest test iteration.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossNear

description: This object specifies the Far Loss Threshold in the latest test iteration.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionFrameLossFar

description: This object represents the signal degrade clear threshold value for the synthetic loss measurement test.
A value of 0 or greater is compared to the frame loss result and a fault is cleared, if loss
is equal to or below this threshold. A value of -1 disables the generation of signal degrade fault notification
This object works in conjunction with cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdSetThreshold. If one object is given
non-default value, other should be also set to non-default value.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CFM-MIB::cienaCesCfmSyntheticLossSessionSdClearThreshold
